cleaned_text: The list of practitioners include both licensed acupuncturist and non acupuncturist. If the practitioner is not a licensed acupuncturist, then his or her modality (modalities) will be listed. If no modalities are listed, that practitioner is a licensed acupuncturist. If you are looking for an Esoteric Acupuncture practitioner, make sure the practitioner understands the intricacies of the energetics involved within the work and is not merely a technician who has memorized a few of the New Encoding Patterns.
